The pastoral letter reburnt by a poetical flambeau
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [London : 1693]
Verse - "Thy pen so paints thy self, that justly we" Imprint from Wing. A satirical attack on Gilbert Burnet. Copy tightly bound with loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
